title: You’re still using email wrong: Here are 9 tips and tricks to fix it
text:
You’re still using email wrong: Here are 9 tips and tricks to fix it 
Published By: BGR.com - Today 
We’re waiting for some bright-eyed tech company to come up with a system to fix everything we hate about email, but in the meantime we can...
